text: @realDonaldTrump @LindseyGrahamSC @LindseyGrahamSC gets my vote if he stands up for racial justice, supports a #Federal Testing & Tracking Plan(112,269 #COVID19 Deaths), supports #GunControl & #ClimateChange & nixes #Trump’s #Dominate answer to peaceful demonstrators. He must stand up to an out-of-control #POTUS
